title: Z Plan: Homecoming
description: In the thrilling conclusion of the Z Plan Trilogy, Cale's limits are put to the final test as he pushes his way through the undead. But something even more sinister follows his every move. In a world where the weak die and every glimmer of hope seems extinguished, Caleâ€™s toughest challenge will be to overcome his inner demons. Can he survive the last leg of his journey?
author: Mikhail Lerma
